post.text: Watch live as Bernie Sanders joins Hillary on the trail in New Hampshire.

comment.author: Timothy
comment.text: Watch that dam flapping hand dude b4 you knock Hillary out. Jesus! !!!

replies.author: Meredith
replies.text: Knock her out that would be funny

replies.author: Timothy
replies.text: Jesus Christ. Every comment I make about Hillary get this reaction patty? Un friend me then I don't need this bull on my page. Thanks. ..

replies.author: Meredith
replies.text: Dint mean to upset you. I don't know how I got on this it was also on my tv. I was just making comments on others too. Didn't know it was yours. I can still be your friend. Even if we don't agree. .
